name: com.avatarsdk.metaperson.loader
description: This package provides scripts and shaders to load MetaPerson avatars.

samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to load MetaPerson avatar.

The purpose of this sample is to show a method for optimizing the size of a downloaded model. It loads a model without its body, replaces the head parts of a template model in the scene, and recolors the body texture.
The sample demonstrates how to load MetaPerson avatars from point cloud.
